name: emailLogin
description: Request a new login for a user to get a token. This will respond with a verification token and send an email to confirm the request. Once confirmed you can use the verification token to get an authentication token.

tokenName.description: The desired name for the token. It will be displayed on the user account details.

$ul: **securityCode**: The code the user is going to receive on the email. **Must** be displayed to the user so they can verify the request is the correct.
**token**: The token used to verify the user accepted the login request
